content: 3tr 3tr in next treble_crochet 3 times loop colour b in ring finger 3tr clusters should be in the middle stitch of previous cluster you should end up with one stitch left repeat for colour b you should end up at opposite ends of spiral row 3 b 1tr in each of next 5tr 3tr in next treble_crochet twice 1tr in next treble_crochet 1htr in each of the next 2tr 1dc into each of the next 2tr slip_stitch into next treble_crochet fasten_off you should end up with one stitch left loop colour a in ring finger repeat for colour a you should end up at opposite ends of spiral pick up colour c loop from the centre with your hook on top and yarn at the bottom work surface chains evenly between the 2 row of colour a & b until you reach the end ©kaye adolphson 2022 row 4 c 1ch *3dc into the centre stitch of the 1st cluster 1dc into each of the next 7tr 3tr in next treble_crochet twice 1dc into each of the next 7 stitches including slip_stitch * repeat from* to * once sls st to first double_crochet fasten_off leave enough yarn to sew together three sides of your hexagon work over the end tails of colour a & b as you go when colours change work a double_crochet into the last slip_stitch 7th stitch and continue to work 3dc into the same stitch in the next colour along should be the middle stitch of the cluster work your last double_crochet into the slip_stitch slip_stitch to first double_crochet fasten_off and leave a long tail for sewing hexagons together to make up sew hexagons by placing right sides together and picking up the back loop on each motif join down one side and leave tail for joining sides of subsequent hexagons i have added a glitter thread to other spiral to mark for special occasions ©kaye adolphson 2022 normal year 365 motifs 21 high row 17 wide
